department.ch: 應用地質研究所碩士班

goal.en: This course introduces how to apply mechanics to analyses of geological structures in order to have deeper understanding of their formation of mechanisms and conditions
goal.ch: 介紹如何將力學的原理運用在地質構造的分析，以期對地質構造之可能形成機制及條件有更深一層的了解。

content.en: Geological structures at different scales will be introdced firstly and then introduction of mechanics, rheology and boundary condition will follow. Meanwhile, some practical examples of analysis will be preseted.
content.ch: 授課內容: 首先介紹不同尺度的地質構造，再引進力學、流變學及邊界條件等觀念。同時搭配實際的案例分析。

textbook.en: John G. Ramsay ＆ Martin I. Huber, 1983. Modern Structural Geology V1: Strain Analysis, Academic press INC. John G. Ramsay ＆ Martin I. Huber, 1987. Modern Structural Geology V2: Folds and Fractures, Academic press INv. Arvid, M. Johnson, 1970. Physical Processes in Geology. Freeman, Cooper ＆ Company, pp. 577.
textbook.ch: John G. Ramsay ＆ Martin I. Huber, 1983. Modern Structural Geology V1: Strain Analysis, Academic press INC. John G. Ramsay ＆ Martin I. Huber, 1987. Modern Structural Geology V2: Folds and Fractures, Academic press INv. Arvid, M. Johnson, 1970. Physical Processes in Geology. Freeman, Cooper ＆ Company, pp. 577.

grading.en: 1. Degree of interaction 2. Performance of oral presentation 3. Score of assignment
grading.ch: 1. 上課的互動。 2. 口頭報告的表現。 3. 作業成績。

office_hr.en: Make an appointment in advance, please.
office_hr.ch: 無固定時段，事先預約即可。

en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)
